timeline.bodyText: getRetentionLeaseStats can return null is it safe to use it like this?
timeline.author: kovrus

replies.bodyText:
Currently the expression implementations in SystemTable catch npe's, so yes it is safe. But maybe worth handling here to avoid unnecessary stacktrace generations.
I'll adapt it
